page.title: 01THE LIFESTYLE OF WINTERTON
page.content: Winterton is a friendly place to live in because the people get on well with each other. It has nearly all the shops you need. Winterton has few busy roads. Most people have cars and parking is a problem on some narrow roads. This is sometimes because people don't have drives to put their cars in. It is a small locality which everyone knows their way round quite well. It has quite a lot of amenities such as the park, hairdressers, tennis courts, library, garages and the health centre. The only main amenity people seem to miss is a chemist shop. 3 out of 4 people said on a survey that this was the only thing. We have 3 schools in Winterton; the infants, juniors and the comprehensive. We go to school 5 days a week from 8.55-3.40 My favourite lesson is English.
